about_the_game:
JETPACK BIRDIE is a fast-pased third-person shooter that takes the fun and freedom of jetpack flights to a whole new level. Use its power to ignore the ground. Find and use wind zones to gain more speed, or risk using accelerated flight, which can overheat your jetpack and cause it to explode.

You are Birdie, a young man on the run from the most powerful gang in the city above the clouds. Evade enemies in a thrilling chase and carve your way to a free future. Cooperate with rebel group called Red Poppy Society and discover the dark secrets of global politics.

Your journey will fuse the short sections of NEON WHITE, classic shooter fun of the original MAX PAYNE, multi-functional weapon of CONTROL and movement that you have never seen before. Master your skills and unlock secrets in highly replayable environments to become an unstoppable force.

Features

  • Highly enjoyable movement with a lot of depth.

  • Short levels with high replayability, reminiscent of speedrun shooters.

  • Includes arcade mode with special challenges, leaderboard and ranking system.

  • Concentrated action story set in an alternate world after the collapse of the Great War.

  • An old school shooter with no covers or unnecessary pauses.
